title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the lightweight server that bundles and serves Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. as a local OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model in two lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain LLM, embed and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (React/Flask) for chatting, model management, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with history, model switching, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into inline code completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; sync/async, POJO mapping, Spring starter included.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Autogen, Docker-Compose recipes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; static binary, tiny runtime, C interop.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images and moderates using Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that caches and serves Ollama models inside containers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI commands via Ollama (summarize, translate, continue writing).

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels with thread support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper using Finch/Tesla for streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with model manager and chat tabs.
